name: Green 4 Bodywork
description: GREEN 4 BODYWORKis a real make-up for exterior, perfect tomake bright your vehicle. Our cream hasfull color-revitalizing properties andprotects the bodywork againstweathering, dirt, dust and acts as waterrepellent. Chemical-free, no acid, madeof selected plant extracts this formula is  unique in its kind releasing a naturalglossy effect without the use ofprofessional tools. No film on thesurface, it works great penetrating thepaint’s micro holes. It has been engineeredto detail, protect and polish thebodywork with high quality effect in fewminutes being 6x faster than standardpolish. Few drops of GREEN 4 RIMS areenough to cover the wheel and make itglossy. Its formulation, 100% plantbased, makes of GREEN 4 RIMS a 100%safe product for the environment, skinand wheel’s surfaces. For cleaning anddegreasing wheels, use GREEN 4WHEELS, a real natural cleaner forgrease, oil and break dust.

name: Green 4 Car Wash
description: GREEN 4 CAR WASH is a natural shampoodesigned to be effective to remove quicklydirt, insect and more on the exterior surface.It is chemical-free and no-acid so means it isnot aggressive on the paint and can be usedon all kind of light alloy, steel and aluminumwheels, plastic and rubber. Its formulation,100% plant based, makes of GREEN 4 CARWASH a 100% safe product for theenvironment, skin and vehicle’s surfaces.After the application, use GREEN 4BODYWORK cream, a real special touch topolish and protect vehicle.

name: Green 4 Fragrance
description: GREEN 4 FRAGRANCE is aMust-Have when it comes to havealways fresh interior.Our formulation is totally VOCs-free, itmeans you don’t breath chemical anddangerous substances.It is not a covering or maskingproduct, it is has been studied tobreakdown the odor molecule and tobe very effective to remove any badodors like smog or just to keep atouch of freshness inside the car.Its formulation, 100% plant basedand with Orchid, makes of GREEN 4FRAGRANCE a 100% safe productfor the environment, skin and interior.

name: Green 4 Glass
description: GREEN 4 GLASS is a specific naturalformulation to degrease and clean theinterior and exterior car windows in a whileand without leaving halos and spots even onglass exposed to the sun.Detailing car windows has never been soeasy and effortless.Its formulation, 100% plant based, makes ofGREEN 4 GLASS a 100% safe product forthe environment, skin and car windows.After the application, use GREEN 4 RIMScream, a real special touch to polish andprotect wheels.
one_liner: NATURAL, ANTISTATIC AND STREAK-FREE SPRAY FOR GLASSES

name: Green 4 Interior Surfaces
description: GREEN 4 INTERIOR SURFACES is anintensive protector and revitalizingnatural cream for interior surfaces.It has been designed to detailsurfaces like plastic, carbon fiber,aluminum, burl wood and more.This product is essential when interiorsurfaces need of a make-up andlooking perfect. Our formula does notleave greasy effect and does not makefilm on the surface. It is also effectiveto reduce dust deposit.Its formulation, 100% plant based,makes of GREEN 4 INTERIORSURFACES a 100% safe product forthe environment, skin and interiorsurfaces. To clean well your interiorsurface, use GREEN 4 INTERIOR.
one_liner: REVITALIZING AND PROTECTIVECREAM FOR INTERIOR

name: Green 4 Leather
description: GREEN 4 LEATHER is the anti-age,nourishing and protective natural creamfor leather seats. Its formulation hasbeen engineered to detail andnourishing the leather fibers and toprevent the aging of the leather.It is also effective to reduce the signs ofuse or excessive wear and to reinforcethe leather’s structure giving morevivacity to the leather’s colors.Its formulation, 100% plant based,makes of GREEN 4 LEATHER a 100%safe product for the environment, skinand seat’s surfaces. To remove stainsfrom fabric or leather seats, use GREEN4 SEATS.

name: Green 4 Rims
description: GREEN 4 RIMS is a protective creamfor all kinds of alloy, steel andaluminum wheels. Chemical-free andno acid can be applied even byhands. Its formulation has beenengineered to detail, protect andpolish the wheel’s surface and leaveshigh quality effect in few minutes, it is6x faster than standard polish.Few drops of GREEN 4 RIMS areenough to cover the wheel and makeit glossy. Its formulation, 100% plantbased, makes of GREEN 4 RIMS a100% safe product for theenvironment, skin and wheel’ssurfaces. For cleaning and degreasingwheels, use GREEN 4 WHEELS,a real natural cleaner for grease, oiland break dust.

name: Green 4 Seats
description: GREEN 4 SEATS is a natural stains removerspray for leather and fabric seats.It safely works great even on stubborn stains.Fast and effective it can be used to removeoil and grease stains also.Its formulation, 100% plant based, makes ofGREEN 4 SEATS a 100% safe product for theenvironment, skin and surfaces treated.After the application, if you have leatherseats use GREEN 4 LEATHER cream, a realspecial touch to nourish and revitalize theseat’s leather.
one_liner: STAINS REMOVER FOR FABRICS AND LEATHER SEATS

name: Green 4 Washing Waterless
description: GREEN 4 WASHING WATERLESS is the bestsolution to wash the exterior area of thevehicle without using water regardless ofwhere you are.Its formulation, 100% plant based, makes ofGREEN 4 WASHING WATERLESS a 100%safe product for the environment, skin andvehicle’s surface.It works great and allow you to wash wellyour vehicle using few product.

name: Green 4 Wheels
description: GREEN 4 WHEELS is a fast and effectivechemical-free, no acid grease, oil and breakdust remover.It can be used on all kind of light alloy, steeland aluminum wheels.Its formulation, 100% plant based, makes ofGREEN 4 WHEELS a 100% safe product forthe environment, skin and wheel’s surfaces.After the application, use GREEN 4 RIMScream, a real special touch to polish andprotect wheels.
one_liner: REMOVE QUICKLY DIRT, GREASE AND BREAK DUST

name: Green 4 Wrap
description: GREEN 4 WRAP, the special and professionalcleaner spray for wrapped surfaces.It is a specific natural formulation to degreaseand clean wrapped vehicles withoutleaving halos and spots.Detailing wrapped vehicles has never beenso easy and safe, it is no acid and chemicalfree.Its formulation, 100% plant based, makes ofGREEN 4 WRAP a 100% safe product for theenvironment, skin and wrapped areas.
one_liner: NATURAL DETERGENT SPRAY TO WASH WRAPPING FILMS
